about_the_game:
Are you ready to set off on a riveting journey "The Power of Chosen One" and immerse yourself in the magical atmosphere of the world of Royal Romances? Additional picturesque locations with multiple mysteries and hidden objects await you in each episode of the series! Unforgettable journeys where you will have to solve intricate riddles, puzzles to save the kingdom, its inhabitants and to find the long-lost creatures. Reveal some interesting secrets to learn more about romantic story series, meet unique fantasy characters and visit exciting locations!

The romance adventure continues with the additional content "Royal Romances: The Power of Chosen One DLC" full of fabulous creatures, wondrous forest and unexpected plot twists. Unlock new achievements after completing all quests!

✨ LEARN ABOUT WONDROUS DRAGONS!
Explore the dark dragons' dungeon and find information about the mighty Eros!

✨ REVIVE THE MAGIC GLADE!
Explore the magical forest and help bring the extinct glade back to life!

✨ FIND INFORMATION ABOUT DRAGONS!
Discover unique information about different kinds of dragons may be useful in the future!

✨ STUDY THE ARCHIVES OF THE PAST!
Reveal the important truth and find out information about one of the characters true origin!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Explore additional locations and achieve new goals! Travel to a wonderful world of magic and learn more about its inhabitants!

English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
